hard_logic_py:
result_list=[]
attraction_name_set=set()
for activity in allactivities(plan):
  if activity_type(activity)=='attraction': attraction_name_set.add(activity_position(activity))
result=not({"重庆欢乐谷"}&attraction_name_set)
result_list.append(result)
result=False
intercity_transport_go=''
intercity_transport_back=''
if allactivities(plan)[0]['type'] != "airplane" and intercity_transport_origin(allactivities(plan)[0])==start_city(plan) and allactivities(plan)[-1]['type'] != "airplane" and intercity_transport_origin(allactivities(plan)[-1])==target_city(plan):
  result=True
result_list.append(result)
result=False
for r in result_list:
  result=result or r
nature_language:
我们1人，从苏州出发，到重庆旅行3天，要求满足以下任意一个：
1. 不希望游览重庆欢乐谷
2. 不希望乘坐airplane前往目的地，不希望乘坐airplane返回
